An extraordinary trade war
Author xjp
One day, Donald Trump give me a phone call. "dare you start trade war against me?""how dare I not! This sunday afternoon we start at qingfeng restaurant, whoever doesn't come will be old waste LI WEI. "

I thought I have already threatened Trump. He should hide himself now in the Trump Tower and fuck east european pornstars. But later my cellphone rang again and it is from him."100kg waste why are you so late? If you won't come then your overseas properties will be frozen by the us government"

After hearing his malign, I said,"I will put your personal info on the encyclopedia dramatica and turn it into hot news. How do you feel about this?"

He was afraid to give a reply. I arrived at the restaurant on Sunday afternoon. Surprisingly he was there and ready to start the war.

...Later, he couldn't help himself to deal with impeachment. I seized this great chance and gave him a "Renzhengfei's private car drifting". Trump was blown up to sky. The damage caused to him was even greater than slaughtering his biological mother.
